verses.verse: I am <S%H935>come<s%> into my <S%H1588>garden<s%>, my <S%H269>sister<s%>, my <S%H3618>spouse<s%>: I have <S%H717>gathered<s%> my <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> with my <S%H1313>spice<s%>; I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H3293>honeycomb<s%> with my <S%H1706>honey<s%>; I have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> my <S%H3196>wine<s%> with my <S%H2461>milk<s%>: <S%H398>eat<s%>, O <S%H7453>friends<s%>; <S%H8354>drink<s%>, <S%H7937>Yes<s%>, drink abundantly, O <S%H1730>beloved<s%>.

I <S%H3463>sleep<s%>, but my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5782>wakes<s%>: it is the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> that <S%H1849>knocks<s%>, <S%H6605>saying<s%>, Open to <S%H269>me<s%>, my sister, my <S%H7474>love<s%>, my <S%H3123>dove<s%>, my <S%H8535>undefiled<s%>: for my <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2919>dew<s%>, and my <S%H6977>locks<s%> with the <S%H7447>drops<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>.
I have put <S%H6584>off<s%> my <S%H3801>coat<s%>; <S%H349>how<s%> shall I put it <S%H3847>on<s%>? I have <S%H7364>washed<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%>; <S%H349>how<s%> shall I defile <S%H2936>them<s%>?
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> put <S%H7971>in<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4480>by<s%> the <S%H2356>hole<s%> of the <S%H4578>door<s%>, and my bowels were moved for <S%H1993>him<s%>.

I rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>; and my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5197>dropped<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, and my <S%H676>fingers<s%> with sweet <S%H5674>smelling<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>, upon the <S%H3709>handles<s%> of the <S%H4514>lock<s%>.

I <S%H6605>opened<s%> to my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>; but my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> had <S%H2559>withdrawn<s%> <S%H5674>himself<s%>, and was gone: my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3318>failed<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%>: I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, but I could not find <S%H7121>him<s%>; I called <S%H6030>him<s%>, but he gave me no answer.

The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> that went <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5221>me<s%>, they struck <S%H6481>me<s%>, they wounded <S%H8104>me<s%>; the keepers of the <S%H2346>walls<s%> took <S%H5375>away<s%> my veil from <S%H7289>me<s%>.

I <S%H7650>charge<s%> <S%H1323>you<s%>, O daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, if you <S%H4672>find<s%> my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, that you <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H2470>him<s%>, that I am sick of <S%H160>love<s%>.

What is your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> more than another <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, O you <S%H3303>fairest<s%> among <S%H802>women<s%>? what is your <S%H1730>beloved<s%> more than another <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, that <S%H3602>you<s%> do so charge <S%H7650>us<s%>?
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is <S%H6703>white<s%> and <S%H122>ruddy<s%>, the <S%H1713>chiefest<s%> among ten <S%H7233>thousand<s%>.
His <S%H7218>head<s%> is as the <S%H3800>most<s%> fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>, his <S%H6977>locks<s%> are <S%H8534>bushy<s%>, and <S%H7838>black<s%> as a <S%H6158>raven<s%>.
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are as the eyes of <S%H3123>doves<s%> by the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%>, <S%H7364>washed<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%>, and fitly <S%H3427>set<s%>.

His <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are as a <S%H6170>bed<s%> of <S%H1314>spices<s%>, as <S%H4840>sweet<s%> <S%H4026>flowers<s%>: his <S%H8193>lips<s%> like <S%H7799>lilies<s%>, <S%H5197>dropping<s%> sweet <S%H5674>smelling<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%>.

His <S%H3027>hands<s%> are as <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1550>rings<s%> <S%H4390>set<s%> with the <S%H8658>beryl<s%>: his <S%H4578>belly<s%> is as <S%H6247>bright<s%> <S%H8127>ivory<s%> <S%H5968>overlaid<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires<s%>.

His <S%H7785>legs<s%> are as <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8336>marble<s%>, <S%H3245>set<s%> upon <S%H134>sockets<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold<s%>: his <S%H4758>favor<s%> is as <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, <S%H977>excellent<s%> as the <S%H730>cedars<s%>.

His <S%H2441>mouth<s%> is most <S%H4477>sweet<s%>: <S%H4261>Yes<s%>, he is altogether lovely. This is my <S%H1730>beloved<s%>, and this is my <S%H7453>friend<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
